post.body: I couldn't agree with you more about Chrysler. Like we do too often, we were thinking short term instead of long term.
I feel your pain. It has snowed here for the past two days (and iced up) and now it's too cold to melt it. I despise winter.
And of course, by "ammend", I meant "amend". Ugh.
You're absolutely right. I'm afraid too many people are missing that point though. I may have to ammend my list. :)
Oh... niiiice. From King Henry to Czar Henry!
Or, you take theirs but have none to offer in return.
Dumbo indeed. Neither does mine. It is one of the most irritating things when I am on a trip somewhere & someone asks.
I think @martastrickland might just be on to something there.
I know what you mean. I like to say I'm the funniest guy I know. :-)
Where is it that you work? I don't guess I have ever known.
I've noticed that before. Has brought a smile to my face a few times. :-)
Wow! It is here too, but that's pretty normal.
You would turn more heads driving the weinermobile. :-) Just sayin'.
I WISH that were the case here. :-(
I am not sure why the first visual I had in my mind was you standing with a gun and SHOOTING photos of your dogs. :)
"son of a Gunderson"
Very important. Hopefully Scoble will take a step back and get some help, although it isn't clear he will from his post.
Perhaps one of the saddest posts. I don't really follow Scoble, so I was unaware of most of this. People must find balance.
RT @mashable: CAREER TOOLBOX: 100+ Places to Find Jobs ( http://ping.fm/uQEix )
Here are 8 Simple (yes, SIMPLE) Ways to Survive a Recession/Depression. Do you have more to add to the discussion? http://bit.ly/YKLZ
Dear, Twitter. Why are you and your 140 characters so appealing?
4 year old boy breaks into discount store to play with toys. http://tinyurl.com/66htx5
Here are 8 Simple Ways to Survive a Recession/Depression. http://tinyurl.com/5l8dc4
Great post by @Rippleon - Do More Good Things - http://tinyurl.com/6qtmwc
Very cool. This reminds me of Seth Godin's business cards. RT @chrisbrogan: Brilliant background, by the way - @PauloCoelho . His community.
If I had a million dollars, I'd be rich.
Festivus display at Illinois capital. http://tinyurl.com/9j2eyj
Today, I am Bob Cratchet. Have to work all day long. Ugh... All the rest of you have a great day though!
"Some men are Baptists, others Catholics; my father was an Oldsmobile man." ~ Ralphie
"My little brother had not eaten voluntarily in over three years." ~ Ralphie
""The pen is mightier than the sword, and considerably easier to write with." ~ Marty Feldman
"Most people are about as happy as they decide to be." ~ Abraham Lincoln
It's a wonderful life.
Okay, Tweeps. I'm outta here for a while.
RT @PhilBaumann: Perhaps among the most important posts of 2008. Read & Re-tweet: http://bit.ly/Wthh
Trying to write for my next blog post, but a headache is trying to spoil all the fun. Ugh...
Great stuff over at Brand Autopsy - http://bit.ly/IyW2D - Can one bad apple really spoil the applecart (workplace)?
"I've made a HUGE mistake." ~ Gob (Arrested Development) http://www.flickr.com/photos/mostextremenegative/3131980973/
RT @thebrandbuilder: Holy cow, this is great! "The Future Is Now" http://bit.ly/Q7kO
Just downloaded the update of TweetDeck. I'm digging it much. Especially the spell check. Whew!
